job.title: Application Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtClient located just west of Chicago is looking for an Applications engineer in the automation industry This individual will have experience with automated systems primarily in the Material Handling field This individual will be the technical liaison between sales and the customer Salary will be based on experienceltbrgtltulgt ltligtBachelors in EngineeringltligtltligtExperience designing automated systemsltligtltligtExperienced in Microsoft productsltbrgtltligtltulgtlocation Melrose Park Illinoisltbrgtjob type Permanentltbrgtsalary 70000  100000 per yearltbrgtwork hours 8am to 4pmltbrgteducation BachelorsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtDevelop Automated Systems used in the material handling industryltligtltligtCreate proposal documents that fully describe and define the solutionltligtltligtCompile review and process incoming information and specifications for new projectsltligtltligtAssist Sales Engineers and our customers by answering technical questions related to our productsltligtltligtReview and integrate internal documentsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtExperience level ltligtltligtEducation BachelorsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkillsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtElectrical EngineeringltligtltligtElectrical EngineeringltligtltligtControlsltligtltligtManufacturingltligtltligtRoboticsltligtltligtPLCltligtltligtElectrical EngineeringltligtltligtMechanical Engineeringltligtltligtmaterial handling 1 year of experience is requiredltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtEqual Opportunity Employer Race Color Religion Sex Sexual Orientation Gender Identity National Origin Age Genetic Information Disability Protected Veteran Status or any other legally protected group statusltbrgtltbrgt
